original_text: And ye shall compass the city, all ye men of war, and go round about the city once. Thus shalt thou do six days.
korean_text: 너희 모든 군사는 그 성을 둘러 성 주위를 매일 한 번씩 돌되 엿새 동안을 그리하라

sentences.original_text: And ye shall compass the city
and go round about the city once
Thus shalt thou do six days
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 여섯 날 동안 이렇게 행할지니라
